pullRequest.title: Refactor JWT authentication
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This PR refactors the JWT authentication process.

Enable subscription validation
Enable event hub data retrieval via REST and JMS protocols.
Refactor code

Issues

#1447
Automation tests

Unit tests added: Yes/No
Integration tests added: Yes/No

Tested environments

Not Tested

Maintainers: Check before merge

 Assigned 'Type' label
 Assigned the project
 Validated respective github issues
 Assigned milestone to the github issue(s)

commit.message:
Refactor JWT token validation implementation

* Move classes into proper packages
* Add subscription data retrieval in startup
* Add JWKS
Add Data retrieval via JMS implementation

Add initial configuration model for the filter chain

* Include a config file with basic configurations
* Implement a config file reader

Fix runtime issues

* Change the apim consumer key claim
* Fix NPE when scope validation failure
* Clean up configuration
